metadata.title: CVE-2020-10814 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in Code::Blocks 17.12 allows an attacker toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted project file.

criterions.comment: codeblocks: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
